Indicator_name: Forest area as a percentage of total land area
Notes: Pristine value is from FAO 2012 State of the world's forests

I did not use the TSU file as it measured only loss, not net loss, so instead calculated extent for 2000 and 2012 from Hansen. The same process could to an extent be done regionally but would be fiddly. A pristine value for global extent of forest would allow this to be put on a 0-1 scale
